title: How to Use Ebates

steps.headline: Go to Ebates.com and sign up for a new account.
steps.description: You won't be able to access coupon codes, free shipping or get cash back until you have username and password that goes through your email.

steps.headline: Type your email and a secure password into the form.
steps.description: Then, click “Sign up.” You will need to confirm your account through your email.

steps.headline: Choose a store for which you can receive a $10 gift card after you make your first $25 purchase.
Return to Ebates.com and sign in.
steps.description: Use the links on the left to find online stores that you frequently use. They are listed by store type.

steps.headline: Look for the percentage sign next to each store.
steps.description: It will show you how much of a rebate you can expect on your purchase.

steps.headline: Go to your account settings.
steps.description: Link your account to your PayPal account to get paid quarterly through email. Opt to get paid by check at your home address if you don't use PayPal.

steps.headline: Click on an Ebates store link before every separate purchase.
steps.description: Even if you do some research on the product you want ahead of time, the best thing is to open a new window, sign into Ebates and follow a single link through to your shopping cart and purchase, instead of using tabs. Your purchase will not qualify for cash back if you don't use the Ebates link to make your purchase.

steps.headline: Use coupon codes and free shipping codes that are listed on Ebates.
steps.description: When your shopping is done and you go to checkout, enter the codes in the coupon field. Then, enter your credit card details and make your purchase.

steps.headline: Return to the Ebates website to see purchases you've made through Ebates.
steps.description: You will be eligible to receive your cash back via PayPal transfer or check each quarter. Refunds and returns will result in money being subtracted from your cash back tab.

steps.headline: Look out for the Ebates Shopping Trip confirmations.
steps.description: After making an order, you should get a confirmation and an Ebates tracking number to inform you that you made a qualifying purchase. Most purchases are tracked and credited within 48 hours.

steps.headline: Download the Ebates toolbar.
steps.description: Chrome, Firefox and Internet Explorer all offer a toolbar extension that helps pick up on sites that are available on Ebates. When the Ebates cash back button informs you of potential cash back, you can sign into your Ebates account and make the qualifying purchase through their link.

steps.headline: Understand that not all online stores are available through Ebates.
steps.description: They currently have over 1,500 stores and the website says that they are adding more stores each week. Use the search bar to ensure your store is not listed in another area before you leave the site.

steps.headline: Read through the restrictions.
steps.description: If you want to know if there are restrictions on your favorite online stores, go through the alphabetical list at http://www.ebates.com/help/storeexceptions.htm. Some stores only allow purchases from certain departments or up to a specific value.

steps.headline: Return all products that you receive and don't want, instead of making exchanges.
steps.description: Once you make a return, the store informs Ebates and they subtract money from your account. Exchanges are processed the same way, so you must return an item and then make a new purchase through the Ebates link to get the cash back on your product.

steps.headline: Refer friends to receive extra money in your account.
steps.description: You can receive an additional $5 for each friend you refer who makes a purchase. Click the “Tell a Friend” tab at the top of the page to start this process.

steps.headline: Accrue at least $5 per quarter in order to receive your cash back.
steps.description: Ebates will only send your money via PayPal or check if you reach this threshold.
